successes.title: Nuimo: Seamless Smart Home Interface
successes.description: Nuimo is a universal controller for the internet of things. Control your music, lights, locks and more.

Pledges.description: We appreciate any support our community can provide.
If you back us we will include your name in a special nuimo documentary about how we made the device and who helped us get there.
This is an SUPER EARLY BIRD SPECIAL (55% off retail)  for friends of Senic, you will receive one nuimo in your choice of black or white for backing us early!
This is an EARLY BIRD SPECIAL (45% off retail) for friends of Senic, you will receive one nuimo in your choice of black or white for backing us early!
Receive one nuimo (30% off retail) in your choice of black or white for backing us with this perk!
Receive one nuimo (30% off retail) in your choice of black or white + a special backplate for mounting
Receive a Developer Edition early delivery nuimo in July and access to our development platform.
Two nuimos in your choice of black or white with this perk!
Three nuimos in your choice of black or white with this perk!
Two nuimos in your choice of black or white and an invitation to our closing party in Berlin as the special guests of the Senic team.
Five nuimos in your choice of black or white with this perk!
